content: on the body please see photo then continue to single_crochet in each st to the other side of the body i worked an single_crochet in 6sts across the front of the body and attach the other arm in exactly the same way single_crochet in each remaining st around as appropriate 18sts round 27 *decrease single_crochet in each of the next 7sts repeat from * once more 16sts ~ 8 ~ round 28 single_crochet in each st around 16sts head continue to crochet in continuous spirals without joining the rounds using a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts optional neck definition & head support round still using skin tone yarn work a round of loose slip stitches into the back loops only of round 28…take note of these unworked front loops beneath the slip stitches… you will work the next round round 29 beneath those front loops…this creates an extra thick round that helps to define the neck and supports the head a little here s a two tone version you ll see the two loops on top formed by the slip stitches and then the unworked front loop beneath them you re working into the stitches beneath that unworked front loop round 29 *work 2sc in each st around 32sts round 30 *single_crochet in each of the next 7sts 2sc in next st repeat from * around 36sts round 31 *single_crochet in each of the next 5sts 2sc in next st repeat from * around 42sts
